io.github.kensuke1984.kibrary.math.geometry

クラス XYZ

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.kensuke1984.kibrary.math.geometry.XYZ

  • public class XYZ
extends java.lang.Object
    3次元直交座標 cartesian 右手系

    3-D Cartesian coordinates right-handed system This class is immutable
